definitions.text: a general direction in which something tends to move
examples: the shoreward tendency of the current
the trend of the stock market
the river takes a southern course
the northeastern trend of the coast

definitions.text: a general tendency to change (as of opinion)
examples: not openly liberal but that is the trend of the book
a broad movement of the electorate to the right

definitions.text: the popular taste at a given time
examples: the 1920s had a style of their own
The car cut to the left at the intersection
The motorbike veered to the right
